root.name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
root.description: StorylineThe story for this game is pretty simple. If you have seen the movie, then that's wonderful. Well the story is about four siblings traveling into a wardrobe, and find themselves in another dimension. Narnia. Then of course they go on an adventure and meet new allies along the way, and it turns out Edmund, the second youngest sibling aids the White Witch, which is the so called the "Queen" of Narnia. All of the animals are ready for battle, with their leader, Aslan. Which is a lion. So together they defeat the white witch and get Edmund back from the Ice Queen. GameplayThere is a endless array of ways to attack in this game. You can switch characters during certain times, and there are many different obstacles along the way. Sometimes, there will be specific moments in which you will have to get a little creative.
